title: Uniswap-Fee-Cal
description: Uniswap Fee Calculator is a tool for you to get the approximated fee APR from every trading pair on Uniswap. Currently it supports Ethereum, Polygon, Optimism, and Arbitrum. Users can easily expand the supported trading pairs and chains by editing the config file.
creator: Tzu Yang Chuang

title: UniKits
description: UniKits are a series of hooks and tools to enhance the functionality of UniSwap v4 Hooks. It's aimed to empower Uniswap-v4 Hooks with Auth to Swap Hooks and Swap to Share Hooks. A subgraph is also built to index on-chain data to form business logic data.
creator: Jamie Cheng

title: Dononymous
description: Dononymous allows you to donate anonymously, and ensures your donation always aligns with your interests.
creator: Nicole Yeh

title: NFT Pool Party
description: Enables you to launch your NFT collection on Uniswap & earn ongoing income streams from royalties (again). Used v4 Hooks to create NFT IDOs and gave the power back to the creators to control their royalties.
creator: nftpoolparty

title: Pedestal
description: A social trading platform where users create contests for them and their friends to compete in.
creator: Alejandro Lopez

title: BestBuy
description: Exclusive discounted swaption market for NFT holders. Swap of 2 different ERC20 currencies.
creator: Norika Kizawa

title: DeSavings
description: DeSavings is an automated savings tool designed to help you create a savings plan for your incoming transactions. Make your wallet "react" to receiving tokens and automatically convert them to your desired currencies based on a split set by you.

title: Captain Hooks Collection
description: A suite of custom Uniswap v4 hooks, offering tailored functionalities for traditional finance sectors with dynamic fee models within the DEX.

title: PADO Protocol Integration Hook
description: Introduces off-chain data attestations via the PADO protocol to Uniswap v4, offering a prototype for privacy-conscious and compliance-oriented token swapping experiences.

title: CypherSwap
description: CypherSwap is a P2P coordination mechanism that replaces VC dependency with direct commerce between creators and collectors. Using custom Uniswap hooks, it validates milestones with NFTs, uses Lens for social vetting & integrates Lit for conditional signing + token-gated access.

title: UniHedge
description: Onchain impermanent loss insurance for Uniswap V3/V4 liquidity providers.

title: Axiom LP Mgmt

title: Blockhead NY23
description: Blockhead is a universal interface for the crypto/DeFi/web3 ecosystem. Now includes an alternative interface for Uniswap V3 in a compact design!

description: migrate uniswap v4 from erc-1155 to erc-6909, saves hella gas, reduces hella codesize.

title: A Pool Party
description: An OmniChain Single Sided Liquidity Provider designed for maximum capital efficiency and ease of use! Utilizing Uniswap v4 hooks & Hyperlane's cross-chain messaging service.

title: Protecc Hook

title: Uni LBP
description: A capital-efficient Uniswap v4 liquidity bootstrapping pool (LBP) hooks contract.

description: This proof of concept Hook addresses the phenomenon of loss-versus-rebalancing (LVR), something which is costing AMM liquidity providers upwards of $100M.

description: Provides an advanced liquidity position management system, offering more dynamic features for LPs than Uniswap's standard position test.

title: Saave Swap

description: Risk management strategies using hooks. The project showcases how hedging mechanisms can mitigate price volatility risks in a trader's portfolio.

description: A truncated oracle is an onchain price oracle that records the price of an asset in a Uniswap liquidity pool using the geometric mean formula.

title: Attestation Hook
description: This hook allows for the querying of attestations from various attestation protocols. Check returned responses against preset criteria in any of the hook functions.

description: Streamlining liquidity management, this hook enables LPs in other DEXes to optimize their Uniswap V4 positions. It facilitates JIT activation for profitable ranges.

title: VannaSwap
description: An ML-driven AMM DEX on the Vanna Blockchain that uses on-chain regression models to compute optimal fees/spreads to protect liquidity providers from impermanent loss and reduce LVR.

description: Borrowing protocol offering put-protected term loans that protect against price liquidation. A Uniswap V4 pool implements custom hooks that lends to the protocol whenever the price moves out of range for a user's LP.

description: Fixed is a subscription based, zero cost trading product on Uniswap for stable swaps designed to increase capital efficiency and limit sandwich attacks. Using Uniswap Hooks, Unbound and Safe, Fixed allows traders to pay subscription to access 0 fee stable pools with no gas fees.

title: sndwch_protocol
description: This protocol proposes a novel method to mitigate Sandwich Attacks in DeFi using Uniswap V4's action hooks. By detecting potential malicious transactions at the contract layer, the protocol secures trades and improves fairness of DEXs.

title: NYCV4Hermit

title: Median Price Oracle
description: An initial exploration of a median price oracle that is more resistant to manipulation than TWAP. It includes an approximation algorithm where a running median can provide substantial gas efficiency on both read and write.

description: A unique hook making a Uniswap pool function as an oracle. The geomean price is calculated using the prices of the assets in the pool. This can be used to get a more accurate price for an asset than a single oracle.

title: Protecc
description: Allows developers and builders to create liquidity pools that automatically leverage Spark Protocol's sDAI and SparkLend.

title: V4 Hook Fuzzer

title: Lucas Martin Calderon's Template
description: A template designed for the ETHGlobal Hackathon, offering the capacity to create custom hooks for specific liquidity pool provisioning.

title: Full Range
description: A hook that allows a Uniswap pool to provide liquidity for a range of prices. This can be used to create a market maker for a volatile asset or to provide more liquidity for a thin market.

description: Empowers token delegates to vote on governance proposals without missing out on providing liquidity.

description: Implements a volatility-based fee structure to mitigate the effects of impermanent loss, enhancing liquidity for high-volatility assets.

title: Porta
description: Porta is a platform bridges bot and user wallet. It allows bot notifying users via telegram message when certain event is triggered and send tx_request to user wallet dirrectly.

title: Old Account

description: A hook to hedge against impermanent loss.

title: UniKits Hooks
description: A series of hooks and tools to enhance the functionality of Uniswap v4 Hooks.

title: Minimize LVR Hook
description: A hook aimed at reducing losses due to rebalancing for liquidity providers, potentially preserving capital and enhancing returns.

title: tAAke Five
description: tAAke five, an Interactive DeFi platform, dramatically improves DeFi investment UX. We empower users to make smarter, easier choices to invest. Liquidity Providers can execute multiple complex transactions in a SINGE CLICK to invest in UniswapV3 using Account Abstraction.

title: Impermanent Loss Hedge (Makemake)
description: A hook to explore ways to hedge impermanent loss for LPs by buying out of the money call options on the underlying asset. When liquidity is added to the pool, the hook is called & executes a purchase of the req. amount of calls in Lyra options protocol.

title: Volatility Oracle
description: A volatility oracle is a contract that provides information about the volatility of an asset. This information can be used to price options and other derivatives.

title: HOOK Finance
description: A hook that enables perpetual trading as a Uniswap V4 Hook! An innovative way to introduce perpetual markets to V4.

title: Dynamic fees based on Volume
description: The hook adjusts the fee based on the incoming volume. The pool operator sets a volume threshold that needs to be reached to increase the fee. When an incoming transaction exceeds the threshold, the fee increases already for this transaction. Gas efficient and very flexible.
creator: BrokkrFinance

title: Liquidity Management
description: It is a hook that automatically manages the LP positions. It divides the deposited liquidity into two ranges - Infinite range and a Narrow range. The infinite range is to make sure there is always enough liquidity for trading and rebalancing the narrow range. The Narrow range is automatically rebalanced when the price movement conditions are met.
creator: BrokkrFinance

title: Combo hook - Dynamic fees + Liquidity locking
description: The hook enables locking liquidity for LP incentives and dynamically adjusts the pool fees based on the incoming swapping volume. It is a combination of our two previous hooks.
creator: BrokkrFinance
